trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Middlebury
There were no other sightings in Middlebury on or around May 26th 2013
divs: sighting detailsthere were 5 of us sitting outside around 10:10 i looked over and up everyone else as well. we got up from the table and walked to the next lawn so we didn't miss anything. it lasted 2-3min tops. it's really hard to exp. them it looked like it could of been red\orange\yellowish orbs i know what those chinese lanterns look like and this was no chinese lantern. it started off in a pattern and then in a line up and down, top ,middle,bottom. the size of it from where we were standing looked like a golf ball in a half. we lost sight of them going up to far they were just gone
Summary: 3red/orange orb objects they were in a row top middle bottom
